name: Super Jewels Maze! - Diamond Link Mania
name_original: Super Jewels Maze! - Diamond Link Mania
description:
Connect diamonds with matching colors to create a link!

Pair all diamonds and cover the entire board with the link to solve each puzzle.

Play through TONS of levels!
You can also race against the clock in time trial mode!

Start playing from easy to more challenging and crazy levels.

DOWNLOAD NOW!! and challenge your friends!

Challenge your problem solving skills in this addictive puzzle!
